selection.heading: Why You Should Choose The Custom Websites SEM Agency?
selection.text: If you not getting traffic, leads, and conversions from your website as you expected, we at The Custom Websites, help you to do so. Here are some of the factors that will help you make a better decision in terms of choosing us for Search Engine Marketing services:

cards.heading: Our Agency Save Your Time
cards.text: When you handle over your marketing management to us, you don’t need to worry anymore. At TheCustomWesites SEM agency, we save your time by handling day-to-day marketing campaigns effectively. So, that you can handle other crucial aspects of your business.

cards.heading: We Provide Customized SEM Offer
cards.text: We care about the uniqueness of your business. We listen to your ideas, goals, and requirements and then propose a personalized SEM offer. Our SEM agency tailor company-oriented marketing campaign to maximize your growth and success.

cards.heading: Reach Your Ideal Customers
cards.text: We choose demographics and keywords for your Ad campaign that your customers are frequently searching for. This causes your ideal customers to land on your page and turn into potential customers.

cards.heading: Help You Get More Traffic
cards.text: SEM management quickly pays back. If you decide to invest in SEM, our experts will do thorough research on your market position and competitors. Then, we will prepare and run the Ad campaign that will let you rank better on search engines and get huge traffic, quickly. More traffic means more conversion and high revenue

description.heading: Now Rank Your Website At Top In Search Engines Result Pages With SEO
description.subheading: Are you facing this problem with your website ranking?
text:
1. Is your website not found online?
  2. Are you facing a sudden decline in websites traffic?
  3. You made a new website and want to build up a new business as soon as possible?
If YES then you surely need professional SEO services and you’re at the right place to seek them.

Being the top Digital Marketing Agency, we offer professional small business SEO services to help businesses get more traffic, more leads, and grow quickly. We target both on-page as well as off-page SEO and provide services like keyword research, content marketing, search engine marketing, social media marketing, technical SEO, and more. Our SEO experts with the assistance of your manager will analyze your business condition and provide professional SEO services to rank your website at the top of the search list. Once you’re at the top, people are going to see you as a professional and trusted brand over your competitors thus bringing more growth opportunities.

tech.techHeading: Are You Experiencing Low Traffic On Your Business Website? Ultimately No Sales?
tech.techText: Poor SEO strategy leads to the loss of website traffic and YES you will not get any orders – Scary! Isn’t it? You need a perfect SEO strategy to grow your business and get more sales. Our SEO experts are always ready to help you using their exceptional skills. We do technical SEO for your website to ensure that it ranks on the top of the Google search list and is understandable by other search engines too. Our SEO audit experts optimize your website for smartphones and optimize the website’s speed making it faster. You can seek our professional assistance and hire SEO experts that will improve all the technical aspects of your website to make it search engine friendly. Your website will rank at the top of the search list making it easier for you to reach more potent customers which will, in turn, increase your sales and boost your business growth. Below are the 10 steps that lead your

cards.heading: Your Goals
cards.text: Setting specific goals is essential to get desired leads. Custom Website's Shopify and WordPress SEO experts analyze your business and goals to provide a plan to help your business's better growth.

cards.heading: Site Audit
cards.text: We use advanced WordPress and Shopify site audit tools to analyze your website to make better strategies and marketing plans that we can use to boost your business growth.

cards.heading: Competitive Analysis
cards.text: Our experts look into your competitors’ business plans and strategies to recognize the gaps. It helps us to identify risks needed to avoid and strategies to adopt for better performance.

cards.heading: Keyword Research
cards.text: In-depth keyword research enables our experts to know what people are searching for instead of what we think they are searching for, thus helping you to rank better on the search engine.

cards.heading: Mapping Optimization
cards.text: Our experts provide complete information on how to do optimization for each page. We optimize your web pages in ways to make it easy for your audience to find you.

cards.heading: Implementation
cards.text: We keep track of all activities from research to optimization that we perform while providing SEO services which helps us analyze potential strategies and plans for better growth of your business.

cards.heading: Monitor Traffic & Ranking
cards.text: We analyze your websites’ performance using Google Search Console and Google Analytics to understand the user behavior and track online traffic thus knowing opportunities to cater well to your audience.

cards.heading: Refine SEO Plan
cards.text: Setting specific goals is essential to get desired leads. Our Shopify and WordPress SEO experts analyze your business goals to provide a plan to help better growth.

cards.heading: .NET
cards.text: .NET is a popular open-source platform with tools that help developers build web applications, mobile or desktop applications, games, and more. It is developed and maintained by Microsoft.

cards.heading: Vue JS
cards.text: Vue.js is a JavaScript-based open-source framework. It is a front-end platform used by developers and programmers to build UIs or User Interfaces. It is created and maintained by Evan You.
